Bury St Edmunds Mobile Library Route 9

Contact us:

Managers: Carl Bell and Kevin Lambert

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 351249

Route timetable

Route 9 Town/village Location Time
9A Edwardstone Mill Green 0945 – 1000
9B Edwardstone Walnut Cottage 1005 – 1020
9C Groton Park Corner 1025 – 1040
9D Groton Rectory 1045 – 1055
9E Boxford Gunary Close 1100 – 1130
9F Boxford Cox Hill 1140 – 1155
9G Boxford Primary School 1200 – 1245
9H Leavenheath c. 11 Old Road 1355 – 1415
9I Leavenheath Wright’s Way 1420 – 1450
9J Leavenheath Maple Way 1455 – 1545
9K Nayland Parker’s Way 1555 – 1630

Calling every 4 weeks on Saturdays:

2019: 19 January, 16 February, 16 March, 13 April, 11 May, 8 June, 6 July, 3 August, 31 August, 28 September, 26 October, 23 November, 21 December
